thread.title: Michele Wiggs
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Michele Wiggs

author: Michele Wiggs
title: Michele Wiggs
text: This was my first time ordering glasses online and I was also ordering for my kids. They were wonderful about communicating with me(a real person!) and working diligently to make sure my experience was a good one. The glasses are GREAT and I will definitely be ordering here again.
